channel.title: AT Dashboard(Bootstrap) on TestNX
channel.description: Recent content in AT Dashboard(Bootstrap) on TestNX

item.title: AT Dashboard(Vue and Vuetify)
item.description: It is alfa testing phase. AT dashboard(Vue and Vuetify) is the spring boot webapp, DB is sqlite and UI is based on Vue and veutify. Test results will be published automatically from multiple test execution nodes to AT dashboard service. User can view all test results by multiple filters and add comments into test cycle in AT dashboard. Then can delete test cycle or execute merge between multiple test cycles.

item.title: Next
item.description: First Rebuild front end with Vue and Vuetify (In progress) Second Import Web API performance results Import Web UI performance results Third Add new dashboard for across multiple resources ?
